description: Patch release fixing reviewer scope, test appropriateness checks, and project context references

userStories.title: Update REVIEWER_TEMPLATE.md with new review scope pattern
userStories.description: As a skill author, I need the reviewer template to document the correct review scope pattern so that new reviewers use git diff main...HEAD consistently.
acceptanceCriteria: Update skills/REVIEWER_TEMPLATE.md Review Scope section to use git diff main...HEAD
Include git diff HEAD for uncommitted changes as secondary check
Add note about falling back to uncommitted changes when on main branch
Document when to use diff-based vs full-repository review scope
Template passes markdown lint validation
userStories.notes: Added feature branch diff pattern (main...HEAD), uncommitted changes (HEAD), main branch fallback, and use case table.

userStories.title: Standardize code-simplifier review scope to feature branch diff
userStories.description: As a developer, I need code-simplifier to review all files changed on the feature branch so that committed code from ralph loop gets reviewed.
acceptanceCriteria: Update skills/reviewers/code-simplifier/SKILL.md Review Scope section
Use git diff --name-only main...HEAD for feature branch changes
Include git diff --name-only HEAD for uncommitted changes
Add note about fallback behavior when on main branch
Review Scope documentation matches the standard pattern from REVIEWER_TEMPLATE.md
userStories.notes: Updated Review Scope section to match REVIEWER_TEMPLATE.md pattern with feature branch diff, uncommitted changes, and main branch fallback.

userStories.title: Standardize test-quality-reviewer review scope to feature branch diff
userStories.description: As a developer, I need test-quality-reviewer to review all test files changed on the feature branch so that committed tests from ralph loop get reviewed.
acceptanceCriteria: Update skills/reviewers/test-quality/SKILL.md Review Scope section
Use git diff --name-only main...HEAD for feature branch changes
Include git diff --name-only HEAD for uncommitted changes
Filter to test file patterns (test_*.py, *_test.py, *.spec.*, __tests__/)
Review Scope documentation matches the standard pattern from REVIEWER_TEMPLATE.md
userStories.notes: Updated Review Scope section to match REVIEWER_TEMPLATE.md pattern with feature branch diff, uncommitted changes, main branch fallback, and test file filtering.

userStories.title: Standardize python-code-reviewer review scope to feature branch diff
userStories.description: As a developer, I need python-code-reviewer to review all Python files changed on the feature branch so that committed code from ralph loop gets reviewed.
acceptanceCriteria: Update skills/reviewers/language/python/SKILL.md Review Scope section
Use git diff --name-only main...HEAD -- '*.py' for feature branch changes
Include git diff --name-only HEAD -- '*.py' for uncommitted changes
Review Scope documentation matches the standard pattern from REVIEWER_TEMPLATE.md
userStories.notes: Updated Review Scope section to match REVIEWER_TEMPLATE.md pattern with feature branch diff, uncommitted changes, main branch fallback, and Python file filtering.

userStories.title: Add Test Appropriateness section to test-quality-reviewer
userStories.description: As a developer, I need test-quality-reviewer to identify over-testing patterns so that test suites stay lean and focused on meaningful coverage.
acceptanceCriteria: Add Test Appropriateness subsection under Standards in skills/reviewers/test-quality/SKILL.md
Document framework/stdlib testing anti-pattern (testing enum values, Pydantic validation, NamedTuple fields)
Document redundant test anti-pattern (same behavior verified multiple ways)
Document test consolidation opportunities
Classify over-testing indicators as warnings (not errors)
Add examples of framework testing anti-patterns
userStories.notes: Added Test Appropriateness subsection with framework/stdlib anti-pattern, redundant test anti-pattern, and test consolidation guidance. All classified as warnings.

userStories.title: Add Project Context section to code-simplifier
userStories.description: As a developer, I need code-simplifier to respect project-specific conventions from CLAUDE.md and AGENTS.md.
acceptanceCriteria: Add Project Context section to skills/reviewers/code-simplifier/SKILL.md
Document checking for CLAUDE.md at project root
Document checking for AGENTS.md at project root
Document checking for .ralph/code-simplifier-standards.md override file
State that project rules take precedence over built-in standards
userStories.notes: Added Project Context section with CLAUDE.md, AGENTS.md, and .ralph/code-simplifier-standards.md documentation. Includes precedence rules.
